description:
This video was pretty much shot straight through, with just one stop to move a camera and take some still images. I suspect most of you guys jump around to the video, but this one plays out nicely with a good ramp up of energy to explosion.
I've said it before, but I rarely pay attention to what the guys are doing. I'm trusting that the blow job will be enough to pull him away from paying too much attention to the tv with the chick flick playing.
He's a watcher, but it's kind of cool to watch him finally give up on the video and just get lost in the moment.
A half dozen members emailed me to tell me Steve was on other sites already fucking dudes. As you might expect, I tend to sit on some videos as I try to balance the site with looks and different themes. As you can tell from the date of production on the film, I sat on these a while. So if you wonder why a model is doing more elsewhere, it is likely cuz he did all his exploring here first, and then went out elsewhere with new confidence.
So these are Steve's "Firsts" and more will air in the coming months, and, lol, you will know by how dang nervous he is!
Having said all that, this is good solid Serviced video with a nice big cock!
title: Bryan & Steve - Serviced
